info.name: WANIGO API - Complete Collection (2026)
info.description: Complete API collection for WANIGO Waste Management System including all endpoints

exec: // Save token from either access_token or token field
console.log("✅ Login successful! Token saved to environment.");

request.description:
NEW: Authenticate with Firebase Google Sign-In.

How to get Firebase ID token:
1. User signs in with Google via Firebase SDK in mobile app
2. Firebase returns ID token
3. Send that token to this endpoint

Response:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Login success",
  "data": {
    "token": "1|abcdef...",
    "token_type": "Bearer",
    "user": {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "John Doe",
      "email": "john@example.com",
      "avatar_url": "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/..."
    }
  }
}

Behavior:
- New users: Creates account automatically
- Existing users: Updates profile with Firebase data
- Token automatically saved to {{token}} variable

exec: console.log("✅ Firebase auth successful! Token saved to environment.");

request.description: NEW: Get katalog with sub-kategori info, filtering, and pagination
NEW: Get sub-categories grouped by kering/basah with icon, warna, slug
Get total_saldo, total_tonase, total_setoran, total_bank_sampah

Create new withdrawal request.

Required fields:
- bank_sampah_id: Bank sampah ID
- jumlah: Amount to withdraw (minimum based on bank policy)
- metode_penarikan: transfer or tunai
- nomor_rekening: Account number (if transfer)
- nama_bank: Bank name (if transfer)
- atas_nama: Account holder name

Approve withdrawal request (Bank staff only).

Optional:
- catatan: Notes for approval

Get detailed information including:
- Items grouped by sub-category
- Status timeline
- is_cancelable flag

Response includes status_setoran with new values:
- pengajuan
- diproses
- selesai
- dibatalkan

Cancel waste deposit submission.

Requirements:
- Status must be 'pengajuan'
- Within 24 hours of creation

Changes status to 'dibatalkan'
